citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:33pm on
25-MAR-20.
Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted via phone. They stated they were out of town and could not conduct an
inspection today.

narrative:
